promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a chibi cute simple lynx grass-type pokemon wearing green runic armor. It can be found in jungle-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, grass or lynx. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Verdanthix, a a chibi cute simple lynx grass-type pokemon. It can be found in jungle-like environments It has the following abilities: Bug Bite, Seed Bomb. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "lynx", "grass" or "Verdanthix". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of grass-type pokemon, lynx-like, simple, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, green and teal ambient lighting
generatedDescription: This adorable feline flora type, known to reside in lush thickets, uses Bug Bite and Seed Bomb. Its playful battles aid forest growth.
